p: In the last decades, the prevalence of inflammatory diseases has increased throughout the world. Steroidal and non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs are mostly used in treating these diseases. However, their use for a long time may have serious side effects that can be mortal. This can explain the interest of many people in herbal remedies as a potential alternative treatment for inflammatory diseases [ 16]. The inflammatory process is a complex biological response of the body including the overproduction of cytokines or pro-inflammatory molecules through the activation of different signaling pathways.
